_readme: Every account is assigned a version id (ver_*)
The values herein are dynamically generated based on version settings
Update this file after any settings are changed to implement the new environments
To offer version selection; Present versions filtered on the tag value
To assign user roles; Create checkboxes from data.[ver_*].roles and persist the selected role id(s) in an array
To check feature access; At least one of the user roles exists in data.[account.ver_*].access.[feature].[keys]
To check feature permission; At least one of the user roles has the required permission in data.[account.ver_*].access.[feature].[keys].[permissions]
